title: [24] THE MACHINE'S DECREE
contents: OUR TIME OF DESPERATION HAS REACHED ITS END
THE MACHINE HAS GIVEN US THE POWER TO FREE OUR LANDS FROM CORRUPTION
NOW, THE MACHINE HAS DECREED THAT WE ARE TO PURGE THIS INFESTATION
WE WILL TAKE TO THE SKIES AND RAIN FIRE ON THE STREETS BELOW
THE INFESTED WILL BURN; ALONG WITH THE SYNDICATE THAT HAD BROUGHT THEM
OUR LANDS WILL NO LONGER BEAR HOST THESE PARASITES, NOR THEIR MASTERS
ATTACK AND DESTROY ALL WHO RESIST THE MACHINE
ATTACK; BURN THEM FROM OUR DEFILED HOMES
